title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1883/84 of 2 July 1984 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1203/73 fixing the conversion factors to be applied to the buying-in prices for fruit and vegetables
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1883/84
of 2 July 1984
amending Regulation (EEC) No 1203/73 fixing the conversion factors to be applied to the buying-in prices for fruit and vegetables
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 1203/73 is hereby amended as follows:
- in Annex V 'Pears' under the heading 'Variety conversion factor', the variety 'Précoce de Trévoux in the fourth entry should read 'Précoce de Trévoux and hybrids',
- in Annex VII 'Apples' under the heading 'Variety conversion factor', the variety 'Mantet' in the third entry should read 'Mantet and hybrids'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 July 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 118, 20. 5. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 130, 16. 5. 1984, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 123, 10. 5. 1973, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 165, 24. 6. 1983, p. 29.
